game.title: Ancient Mysteries
game.objective: Uncover the secrets of an ancient artifact.
game.description: The Book of Ancients is rumoured to hold great power and knowledge. It is hidden somewhere in the ancient ruins of Alaranth. Find the book and bring it back to the Order of the Arcane.
game.quest-giver: Master Braemore of the Order of the Arcane

task.objective: Find the ancient ruins of Alaranth.
task.description: Travel to the ancient ruins of Alaranth located in the northern mountains.

task.objective: Search for clues leading to the Book of Ancients.
task.description: Look for any ancient texts or artifacts that may mention the book's whereabouts.

task.objective: Defeat the guardians protecting the Book of Ancients.
task.description: The book is guarded by powerful creatures. Be prepared for a fight.
task.location: Vault in Ancient Ruins of Alaranth

task.description: Find the book and take it safely back to Master Braemore.
task.location: Vault in Ancient Ruins of Alaranth
